Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Northbound Reroute near Vincennes/115th
ShortDescription: Northbound 111 111th/King Drive  buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 112th Place and Vincennes: due to, street blockage near Vincennes/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #111 111th/King Drive  buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 112th Place and Vincennes: due to, street blockage near Vincennes/115th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago,   #67 67th-69th-71st  Temporary Westbound Reroute near 69th/Calumet
ShortDescription: WB 30 South Chicago,  67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Calumet.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #30 South Chicago,  #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th, King Drive, 71st, State and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Calumet.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line Service Delayed near Oakton
ShortDescription: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains continue to stand near Oakton due to an obstruction. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains continue to stand near Oakton due to an obstruction.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #97 Skokie

  • Also, as a result of the delayed train, shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service from Howard to Skokie in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Monroe. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Monroe.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
